tool_description: OpenAI's GPT-3 language model to request any prompt message same as chatgpt
name: Scodex API
title: Scodex API

api_list.name: simple post request
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scodex-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scodex-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://scodex-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scodex-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
